name: Traveler's Bazaar
description:
Welcome to  Traveler's Bazaar, a stall that supplies consumables for travelers of all sorts. Traveler's Bazaar is popular amongst adventurers, but there's just one problem-You're the only employee! Make sure to bag the correct amount of items in a timely manner!

HOW TO PLAY

Up to three travelers will show up at the stall with an order. Each traveler will tell you the type and amount of items needed to complete their order. You are in charge of packing bags with the requested items to help these adventurers on their journeys. 

To pack an item, click on its corresponding basket and drag and drop the item to the backpack closest to the traveler. Once you finish packing, click on the backpack to send the traveler on their way.

If you pack correctly, you gain one point. If not, you will lose a life.

Travelers will get impatient based on how many items they ask for. The less items requested, the less patient they will be. If they get too impatient, they will leave and you will lose a life.

To help pack bags, there is brown plank that you can drag around. Items can slide down the plank into the backpacks. Right-click the plank to change its direction.
